snippet: An enduring bohemian spirit and newfound cosmopolitanism have cultivated fertile culinary ground for the city's emergence as the continent's vegetarian capital. Three East Berlin establishments offering vegan brunch options rise to the occasion.
abstract: An enduring bohemian spirit and newfound cosmopolitanism have cultivated fertile culinary ground for the city's emergence as the continent's vegetarian capital. Three East Berlin establishments offering vegan brunch options rise to the occasion.

headline.main: (Vegan) Brunch Options Abound in East Berlin
